org.tantalum.storage

Interface FlashCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidCache, RMSCache

    public interface FlashCache
    A Hashtable-style interface for persistent data. Each implementation is platform-specific (J2ME, Android, ...)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getData(java.lang.String key)
      Get the data object associated with the key from persistent memory
      java.util.Vector getKeys()
      Provide a list of all keys for objects stored in persistent memory
      void putData(java.lang.String key, byte[] bytes)
      Store the data object to persistent memory
      void removeData(java.lang.String key)
      Remove the data object from persistent memory
